title: Wallets
description: Create new wallets and change settings for current ones
Add emails to inform about new transactions
Log for each change in the wallet settings

title: Transfers
description: Target amount, commission, rate & blockchain fee

title: Deposits
description: Create new deposits and change settings for current ones
Custom of number confirmation block for callback

title: Payouts
description: Create new payouts and change settings for current ones
Configurable number of confirmation per payout

title: Action logs / Events
description: Approve or cancel payouts created by staff users “Withdrawals with approval” role

title: Exchanges
description: View exchange history and create new exchanges
Choose blockchain fee level for new exchanges
Choose source and destination wallets as well as exchange amount
